body_html:
That would be great! Using np.multinomial has been pretty challenging due to the fact that the batch size isn't evaluated until you run the session.

If I understand things correctly, the only way to use np.multinomial is to tensor.eval() (to convert the tensor to a numpy array). Unless there is some other way I'm not aware of that converts tensor to numpy arrays...

body:
That would be great! Using np.multinomial has been pretty challenging due to the fact that the batch size isn't evaluated until you run the session. 

If I understand things correctly, the only way to use np.multinomial is to `tensor.eval()` (to convert the tensor to a numpy array). Unless there is some other way I'm not aware of that converts tensor to numpy arrays...
